idea:
Doot is a secure and confidential application for data and communication to be exchanged. Data privacy is threatened by various factors and Doot helps users feel confident in sending and receiving sensitive data without being exploited.

We enable users to exchange data and communication without prying into their data. Your data is your data, and no one should have access into it except you.
name: Doot
JARVIS TECHNOLOGY AND STRATEGY CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Jaivik Farms is culmination of several years of experiments & learning with Organic ways of farming including Amrut Krushi, using Amrut Mitti, Amrut Jal, benefits of Homa Therapy, etc to revitalize soil and recreate the food with all the right values and composition that provides us nutrients and hence nutrition for a healthy living. We work directly with farmers by educating & supporting them, guiding them to grow food using right techniques and ensuring optimum quality and yield without use of any harmful pesticides and chemical fertilizers. Its in our ethics and endeavor to ensure enhanced and sustainable Farmer’s income & happiness in the process. We then harvest, pack, label under brands and Market the products. We are ready with over 150 consistently marketable Organic products. Jaivik Farms is about Organic Food, wherein we grow some ourselves, Buy from contract farming & farmers in the consortium, we process, we buy from trustworthy sources in our consortium who are processors, we label, we relabel, trade, sell, market, at local level and e-commerce. We wish to export & also start our own Branded Retail Stores in India and International Cities

Jaivik Farms Brand has been conceptualized Shri Ajit Thomas who is associated for several years and mentored by Shri Jitubhai Kutmutia, of Malegaon and his brand Nisarg Prem. Shri Ajit is strongly associated ad works with Shri Nitaben Patel from Rajkot famed for the Sajeevan Organic Farm family. Apart from them being on the Jaivik Advisory Board, there are Ayurvedic Doctors, Dieticians, Farmers.

Jaivik Farms With guidance from Shri. Jitubhai, Jaivik Farms is ready with Health Food Kit. 90 days of consumption as prescribed regulates all your body functions critical parameters and can be lab tested for improvement before an after the course.

Jaivik Farms aspires to become the most premium label in the Organic food world. Jaivik Farms has set its sight to seek registration & support from AYUSH Ministry in the near future to create and add to its portfolio Plant based food supplements, extracts, tinctures, herbal oils, natural enzymes which can wean people away from dependence on the pharmaceutical drugs and their side effects to heal chronic conditions in a slow and natural manner.
name: FARMS JAIVIKAGRI LLP

idea:
Smit.fit is a self-care solution for people living with (or at risk of) chronic lifestyle conditions such as diabetes, heart disease and hypertension. The objective is to help these individuals gain mastery over their condition, deliver clear health impact in the 3-6 months’ timeframe and overall move them to a new model of living with these conditions (from constrained to fuller life)

The solution involves 4 elements:

• Integrated self-care software platform with several functionalities including goal setting, daily planning (“Lifeplans”), resource libraries (yoga, exercises, diet etc.), health data tracking (across 5+ vitals) and nudges

• Human coaches (psychologists, dieticians, exercise consultants etc.) who ensure constant monitoring and encouragement, coupled with expert advice

• Smart medical devices (sleep tracking, glucometer, BP, weighing machine etc.)

• Community and related events

We aspire to meaningfully impact a million lives in gaining mastery over chronic conditions over the next 5 years.

idea:
Dear Sir,

This has reference to the undersigned today regarding Pharmaceutical Machineries.

We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as a growing engineering company based at Mumbai established in 1985, managed by group of professionals with vast experience in Pharmaceutical, Chemical, Food and other allied process industries, Pharmacy Colleges, R & D Centers.

The company is having deep technical knowledge and spending its best in research, production and quality control, to expand its wings into vast Indian and Overseas market. The company has manufacturing unit at Vasai, Mumbai and Thane in Maharashtra with best infrastructure for marketing, in-house manufacturing, design & development of new products, after sales installation service wherever the machines go. Maintaining our best quality of the products, we have achieved faith of our valued Buyers.

We hereby request you to kindly study our enclosed Products Catalogue, Clients & Products List and if required you can log on to our Web Site www.pamtechent.com and you are always welcome to mail us for your enquiries or technical support to pamtechent@gmail.com to enable us to help you out for the total solutions.

We now look forward to receive your valued enquiries, which will get our prompt attention.

Thanking you,

For PAM TECH ENTERPRISES.

DIRECTOR.
name: Jyotsna B Panchal
